resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Proximity notification beep (configurable in Settings - Map)
 · New: Show favorite percentage in cache details
 · New: Add hint how to reset authorization data (long click in Settings - Services sub menus)
 · New: Use https for send2cgeo
 · New: Have button for last selected list in list selection when saving cache
 · New: Use new GeoKrety API
 · New: Show also personal note when clicking on the hint button in map popup window
 · New: Add Text-To-Speach navigation to cache and waypoint popup
 · New: Show routed distance (requires brouter app) instead of or additionally to direct distance for selected cache on map
 · New: Support for new cache types HQ Celebration and Community Celebration
 · Fix: Reintroduce live map loading indication (horizontal progress bar)
 · Fix: Also include other satellite systems than GPS in location info on mainscreen
 · Fix: Waypoint of other lists leaked onto a mapped list
 · Fix: Waypoints of owned caches not filtered properly on map
 · Fix: Updated opencaching attributes
